meanings.definition: The quality or state of being lustrous.
meanings.sent1: The lustrousnesses of the diamond caught everyone's eye.
meanings.sent2: The lustrousnesses of the polished silver was dazzling.
meanings.sent3: The lustrousnesses of the paint made the walls look like they were glowing.
meanings.sent4: Her smile had a lustrousnesses that brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The lustrousnesses of the moonlight on the lake was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: The shine or brightness of something.
meanings.sent1: The lustrousnesses of the sun on the water was blinding.
meanings.sent2: The lustrousnesses of the stars in the night sky was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent3: The lustrousnesses of the disco ball made the party more fun.
meanings.sent4: The lustrousnesses of her hair under the spotlight was like spun gold.
meanings.sent5: The lustrousnesses of the fireflies in the dark forest was enchanting.
